original_title: Ukrainian sniper breaks world record with 13,000-foot kill shot: report | Fox News
article_summary: Ukrainian snipers set a new world record for the longest confirmed sniper kill, eliminating Russian troops from over 13,000 feet, amid increased Russian attacks in Pokrovsk, Ukraine. The record-breaking shot was made using artificial intelligence and drone guidance, and took place a day before President Trump's summit with Russian President Vladimir Putin.</s>
